# Station Alert - Cyan
[italic]Called by: Anyone with Command-Level Access at a working Communications Console.[/italic]
[bold]Conditions:[/bold]
A large number of cyborgs and/or the AI are malfunctioning and/or have lawset(s) that are faulty or malicious in nature.
[bold]Security:[/bold]
Security is required to be armed and ready to deal with any silicons;
Security is suggested to use EMP grenades and ranged lethal weaponry, as well as a moderate level of armour (such as riot gear);
Only destroy cyborgs if they pose a direct threat to the safety of the personnel.
[bold]Science:[/bold]
Roboticists are required to turn cyborgs back to Crewsimov or NT Default lawsets;
The Research Director or roboticist should disable all cyborgs with their console;
If the AI is malfunctioning, the Research Director should try to download the AI's consciousness onto their Intellicard.
[bold]Secure Areas:[/bold]
EVA Storage, Tech Storage, Gravity Generator, Engineering Secure Storage, AI Upload, Vault, Gateway, anywhere else requiring command level access that does not get regularly used.
It is recommended to bolt any door leading to an important area, so cyborgs cannot enter that room.
[bold]General Crew:[/bold]
All personel are to remain in their department, for Visitors (anyone with Civilian-level access) it is inside the Bar, Library or Dormitories.
